citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:05 PM on July 12,
2021.
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file. The inspector
also honked their horn numerous times and waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:05 PM on July 12, 
2021. 
 
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file. The inspector 
also honked their horn numerous times and waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
